name: raspi-monitor
description: Raspberry Pi System Monitor - Complete monitoring solution with real-time dashboard and task management

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm version patch --workspace=backend && npm version patch --workspace=frontend
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm version minor --workspace=backend && npm version minor --workspace=frontend
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm version major --workspace=backend && npm version major --workspace=frontend
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run version:patch
